summary: Juan "Accidentes" Dominguez is on his biggest case ever. On behalf of twelve Nicaraguan banana workers he is tackling Dole Food in a ground-breaking legal battle for their use of a banned pesticide that was known by the company to cause sterility.
cast: Byron Rosales Romero|Juan J. Dominguez|Duane Miller|Rick McKnight|David Delorenzo|Mercedes Del Carmen Romero
title: Bananas!*
